fields.description:
There were a number of fixes to master to support iOS 7.0.3 and Xcode 5.0.1 that should be backported to 3.1.X. This includes:

* ti info -t ios
* ios detection in node-appc
* correct ios sdk detection from pre-compile phase
* simulator directory discover
* probably others
fields.summary: CLI: iOS: Backport fixes for iOS 7.0.3 and Xcode 5.0.1 to 3.1.X

comments.body:
Titanium SDK 3.1.x pull request: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/5120

node-appc master pull request: https://github.com/appcelerator/node-appc/pull/71
node-appc 3_2_X pull request: https://github.com/appcelerator/node-appc/pull/72
node-appc 3_1_X pull request: https://github.com/appcelerator/node-appc/pull/73

Closing ticket as fixed. Verified the following:

1. Was able to launch to iphone/ipad simulators (including 64-bit) 7.X and 6.X with Xcode 5.0.2, 5.0.1, 5.0
2. Was able to install app to ios devices (iphone 5 (7.0), iphone 4s (6.0.1), ipad 3 (6.0.1)) with Xcode 5.0.2, 5.0.1, 5.0
3. Was able to adhoc package and install app to devices (iphone 5 (7.0), iphone 4s (6.0.1)) with Xcode 5.0.2, 5.0

Tested with:

Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.2.0.201312121648
SDK build: 3.1.4.v20131213162008
CLI: 3.2.0 (github.com/appclerator/titanium.git#3_2_X)
